metadata.name: Can't breathe
metadata.description:
This person whose head is covered by black plastic bag wearing a red hawaiian shirt could be any Thai dissident. But this artwork is clearly about Wanchalearm Satsaksit, a Thai political refugee who was enforced disappearance in June 4, 2020 from his apartment in Phnom Penh in broad daylight. The picture is imitating Wanchalearm's last FB profile picture which is now also disappeared from the system, just like his fate is unknown til now. This year marks the 2nd anniversary of his disappearance. 

Wanchaleam's sister, Sitanun Satsaksit, collaborated with the artist who created this artwork to commemorate the 2nd year of his disappearance.
